name: Metryus
tagline: Web and Mobile application development for FinTech
description:
Metryus is a full-cycle mobile and web app development firm with 32 people and offices in London and Kyiv.
Trusted by entrepreneurs, startups and businesses from 7 countries and beyond.
What we do
 
Mobile and Web app development focused on fintech.
Industry tested UX/UI design for financial digital products.
MVP prototyping and development.
Systems integration and technical consulting.
Back-end and API development.
 
Why work with us
After 10+ years of experience in Banking and FinTech we accumulated expertise in:
Internet and mobile banking,
E-wallets,
Money transfers,
Consumer lending,
Wealth management,
Open banking,
Insurance
We are now using this foundation to build and deliver reliable, high performance, scalable and well-designed application to clients both in FinTech and beyond.
